defaultValue.description: The initial value of `value` when uncontrolled

disabled.description: If `true`, the checkbox group is disabled

invalid.description: If `true`, the checkbox group is invalid

name.description:
The name of the input fields in the checkbox group
(Useful for form submission).

onValueChange.description: The callback to call when the value changes

readOnly.description: If `true`, the checkbox group is read-only

value.description: The controlled value of the checkbox group

checked.description: The controlled checked state of the checkbox

defaultChecked.description:
The initial checked state of the checkbox when rendered.
Use when you don't need to control the checked state of the checkbox.

form.description: The id of the form that the checkbox belongs to.

id.description: The unique identifier of the machine.

ids.type: Partial<{ root: string; hiddenInput: string; control: string; label: string }>
ids.description: The ids of the elements in the checkbox. Useful for composition.

name.description:
The name of the input field in a checkbox.
Useful for form submission.

onCheckedChange.description: The callback invoked when the checked state changes.

value.description: The value of checkbox input. Useful for form submission.
